original_text: Then Ezra arose and made the leading priests and Levites and all Israel take an oath that they would do as had been said. So they took the oath.
korean_text: 이에 에스라가 일어나 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 온 이스라엘에게 이 말대로 행하기를 맹세하게 하매 무리가 맹세하는지라

sentences.original_text: and made the leading priests and Levites and all Israel take an oath
sentences.korean_translation: 주요 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 온 이스라엘에게 맹세하게 하였습니다

sentences.original_text: that they would do as had been said
